channel.title: blender for source
channel.description: hello i rember a while back someone posting a vid that showed how to set up blender so you can use it via source, if anyone can point me in the right direction it would be surely thanked also can i use blender in the making of npcs and such?

item.title: blender for source
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
If you dig around in the blender scripts folder, I think there’s an smd import script, but it gives me errors, unfortunately. Maybe you’ll have better luck. I haven’t found another mdl or smd import script, but I haven’t really looked, either.

Read full topic

item.title: blender for source
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
That would be me. here’s the link again: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9RTTSACe_eI

I think that’s the only smd script that actually works.

Also, yes NPCs work, you just need to rig them correctly. Most of the work making them actual NPCs isn’t actually in blender.

Read full topic
